[[File:Christopher Tolkien - Nevrast.jpg|250px|thumb|Datail of the [[:File:Christopher Tolkien - Map of Beleriand (colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|Map of Beleriand]] by [[Christopher Tolkien]]]]

The '''Marshes of Nevrast''' were wide marshes in the midst of [[Nevrast]], encircling the mere of [[Linaewen]] which had no certain shores.<ref>{{S|Beleriand}}</ref>
